meaningMnemonic:
<kanji>Change</kanji> and <kanji>transition</kanji> mean <vocabulary>change</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>transition</vocabulary>! Nifty.

変遷 refers to historical or long-term changes. It’s often used when discussing the evolution or progression of entities over long periods.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
